titleStmt.title: Royall exchange to suche worshipfull citezins, marchants, gentlemen and other occupiers of the contrey as resorte therevnto. Try to retaine, or send back agayne. The contents ys after the preface. Sene and allowed here.
titleStmt.author: Payne, John, fl. 1597.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
